scripts.db: sequelize-auto -o ./schemas -d W2Q1 -h localhost -u postgres -p 5432 -x kevingreat -e postgres

comments.dependencies: libraries on which the project relies to function effectively
comments.express: node js web application framework that provides broad features for building web and mobile applications
comments.dotenv: zero-dependency module that loads environment variables from a .env file into process.env
comments.pg: untuk koneksi,memanggil, dan manipulasi data dari database postgres. menyerahkan data pada sequelize
comments.sequelize: powerful library in Javascript that makes it easy to manage a SQL database. return data as javascript object
comments.cors: node.js package for providing a Connect/Express middleware that can be used to enable CORS with various options
comments.cookie-parser: Parse Cookie header and populate req.cookies with an object keyed by the cookie names.
comments.helmet: helps you secure your Express apps by setting various HTTP headers
comments.nodemon: helps developers create node.js applications by automatically restarting the node application when a file change is detected in the directory
comments.babel: popular tool that lets you use the newest features of JavaScript
